subject: USB short
description_text:
Hi I recently bought the Simsonn plus X pedals and the usb I plug into my
computer seems to be shorting the circuit whenever plugged in, I bought an
external hub with a power source and it still shorts that, it doesnâ€™t even
need to be connected to the pedals to do it it will short even with nothing
connected, has this happen to people before, do I need a new cable?
